text.text_translated: Today, a lot of business is international. Many business people speak English. But the rules for business are different in each culture. These rules are about how to talk and act politely. If you do not understand these rules, you might think bad things about people that are not true. This can cause bad misunderstandings. It can also mean people cannot talk to each other well. Business etiquette is the polite way to act in business. Here are three examples of different etiquette around the world. This information can help you work with people from other countries.

Your version simplifies these to 'think bad things about people' and 'people cannot talk to each other well'. This simplification is too extreme and loses the professional context and severity of the original concepts.

- BERTScore Failure: The score is low because key lexical items from the original were completely removed, not simplified. Phrases like 'cultural norms and practices' and 'stand you in good stead' carry specific meaning that was lost, damaging the fidelity of the text.

Instead of 'cannot talk to each other well', use a phrase that implies a complete stop, such as 'communication can stop working'.

best_attempt.text_translated: Today, a lot of business is international. Many business people speak English. But how people communicate in business is different in each culture. Each culture has different ideas about what is polite. If you do not understand these ideas, you might judge people unfairly. This can cause bad misunderstandings. It can also stop communication. Business etiquette is the polite way to act in business. Here are three examples of different etiquette around the world. This information can help you work with people from other countries.
